markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" />command, Interact;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You bring the might of the mountain into your body. You cast 2nd-level or 4th-level [_enlarge_](/Spells.aspx?ID=102) upon yourself. If you're at least 15th level, the duration increases to 1 hour.
name: command, Interact
